General.Name: Shanghai Ailu Package Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai Ailu Package Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of industrial paper packaging products, plastic packaging products, and intelligent packaging systems. It offers industrial packaging bags and industrial PE packaging products, as well as packaging products for cosmetics and daily consumption products. Shanghai Ailu Package Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China.
